description:
As the bandits advance on the city, Aisha and Rinrin do everything they can to hold down the city gates and protect the villagers. Will the truth about Ryubi finally be revealed?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gun`yuu, Kousan no Ran o Shizumento Suru no Koto
The Generals Attempt to Suppress the Yellow Turban Rebellion
群雄, 黄巾の乱を鎮めんとするのこと
